summary: The diff implements most requirements: FounderSection.tsx is created and added to the landing page, FacebookSection is removed from App.tsx, and FounderSection is reused in WebDesignServices.tsx. However, there are notable deviations regarding the photo source path and the heading text shown in the component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the founder's photo from frontend/public/assets/generated/founder-photo.png served as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/
missing_requirements.reason: The FounderSection.tsx uses '/assets/IMG_20260209_103145.png' as the image src instead of '/assets/generated/founder-photo.png'. The build request and constraints explicitly state the photo must be served from frontend/public/assets/generated/ as a static asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: Below the photo, display the bold heading 'Our Founder' in large bold typography
missing_requirements.reason: The FounderSection.tsx shows 'The Person Behind Evergreen Hub' as the h2 heading instead of 'Our Founder'. The acceptance criteria explicitly require 'Our Founder' to appear in bold below the photo.

hallucinated_features.description: Section header badge 'Meet the Visionary' and h2 heading 'The Person Behind Evergreen Hub' instead of the required 'Our Founder' heading
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies the bold heading must read 'Our Founder'. The component instead uses different marketing copy not requested in the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: Skill/service badges (Web Design Expert, Digital Entrepreneur, Video Editor, Google Map Pro) displayed in the founder card
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify displaying skill badges. While decorative elements are encouraged, these specific labeled skill badges were not part of the requirements.
